ticket.title: TICKET REGISTRATION
ticket.notice1: Each account can only purchase 1 ticket.
ticket.notice2: After selecting a ticket, you will be redirected to the payment page.
ticket.notice3: Please transfer the exact amount and content as instructed.
ticket.notice4: After transferring, click "I have paid" for staff verification.
ticket.noTicketDesc: Buy a ticket to attend FUVE Convention!
ticket.completePayment: Please complete payment to confirm your ticket.
ticket.paymentReceived: We have received your payment confirmation. Please wait for staff verification.
ticket.noBadgeYet: You haven't filled in badge information yet. Update to complete registration!

ticket.instruction4: After transferring, click the button below
ticket.clickAfterPayment: Click the button above after you have completed the transfer
ticket.confirmPaymentDesc: You confirm that you have transferred {amount} VND with content {code}?
ticket.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
ticket.confirmCancelTicket: Are you sure you want to cancel this ticket?
ticket.confirmCancelTicketDesc: The stock will be returned and you can purchase a new ticket.
ticket.ticketCancelError: Failed to cancel ticket. Please try again.
ticket.badgeUpdateError: Failed to update badge details. Please try again.
ticket.paymentConfirmError: Failed to confirm payment. Please try again.
